headline: Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK) Plans New Natural Gas Plant In South Carolina Expansion
summary: Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK) announced plans to construct a new natural gas power plant in South Carolina, emphasizing its focus on regional electricity needs. Despite this expansion effort, Duke Energy's share price declined 1.5% over the past week, contrasting with the broader market's 1.5% gain. Market trends were influenced by anticipation surrounding U.S.-China trade talks, boosting optimism across various sectors. Duke Energy's modest decline might reflect investor caution despite positive...

headline: Duke Energy to propose new natural gas plant in Anderson County, SC
summary: Duke Energy (DUK) announced the company’s intent to submit an application to the Public Service Commission of South Carolina for approval to build a new natural gas power plant in Anderson County. As part of the company’s responsibility to serve nearly 860,000 retail electric customers across 30 South Carolina counties, Duke Energy says it needs to build and enable large amounts of new generation quickly to keep up with the success the state is seeing in economic development and population growt

headline: Sector Update: Energy Stocks Rise Pre-Bell Tuesday
summary: Energy stocks were rising pre-bell Tuesday as the Energy Select Sector SPDR Fund (XLE) was 1% higher

headline: As Summer Approaches, Duke Energy Dedicates $200,000 To Help Low-Income Hoosiers Manage Home Energy Costs
summary: PLAINFIELD, Ind. - Duke Energy Indiana is dedicating $200,000 to its Share the Light Fund to support customers facing financial hardship this summer. The funding aims to help families and individuals...
